remix_prompts: Make a storyboard of a student navigating a health tracker — what do they gain or lose?
Design a wearable that lets users turn off or distort tracking — ethically and creatively
Write a satire of a health app that tracks everything... including your thoughts
Create a two-column infographic: ‘My Version of Events’ vs. ‘My Tracker’s’
Turn a health study into a zine titled: 'Tracked But Not Heard'
